subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] listening to posts
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-266524297-1206646868=:63611
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Hi Bruce and group    I appreciate these new files with evpmaker because I am unable to get any meaningful radio signals here in Mexico to use my RS hacks.  I manage to be classic evps but no direct response messages or two way.   This gives me hope of accomplishing something more.  Question for Bruce, I am guessing your speed when playing and recording the evp session is around 90% no?  Also, are you using the Zcross or x fade features?  How about segments 80 plus or minus?   I have tried Stephans download of speaker jet vowels with wavemaker but can't pick out anything from the other side.  When I listen to your files, some messages pop out and others I listen to many times and still get nothing.  I am convinced it is my tin ear and the messages exist in your files.  Plan to put myself through a training program at this end to hear the messages...then maybe I can successfully get my own sessions going.  Thanks for your efforts.  And, I thank Stephan for sharing his files
 and knowledge.  Ron L  

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          
I know everybody including myself says"oh no not another 10 files to 
listen too" but I think these files from this new method are worth the 
effort.

Give a listen and lets start getting some opinions on this new EVPM 
method.

bruce



                           

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
